metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2469 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description:
GNU SASL libgsasl server-side read-out-of-bounds with malicious authenticated GSS-API client

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2469` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gsasl - 2.2.0-1ubuntu1
gsasl-common - 2.2.0-1ubuntu1
libgsasl18 - 2.2.0-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gsasl package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.0-1ubuntu1').
